article.title: THE IMMIGRATION DEBATE Immigration amnesty backfired

title_result: HEARING OF THE IMMIGRATION, CITIZENSHIP, REFUGEES, BORDER SECURITY, AND INTERNATIONAL LAW SUBCOMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE JUDICIARY COMMITTEE;SUBJECT: "THE ETHICAL IMPERATIVE FOR REFORM OF OUR IMMIGRATION SYSTEM";CHAIRED BY: REPRESENTATIVE ZOE LOFGREN (D-CA);WITNESSES: RICHARD LAND, PRESIDENT, ETHICS AND RELIGIOUS LIBERTY COMMITTEE, SOUTHERN BAPTIST CONVENTION; GERALD KICANAS, VICE-PRESIDENT, U.S. CONFERENCE OF CATHOLIC BISHOPS; MATHEW STAVER, DEAN AND PROFESSOR OF LAW, LIBERTY UNIVERSITY SCHOOL OF LAW; JAMES EDWARDS, JR., FELLOW, CENTER FOR IMMIGRATION STUDIES;LOCATION: 2141 RAYBURN HOUSE OFFICE BUILDING, WASHINGTON, D.C.
